QuestData.Title: The Third Flamegate
QuestData.Description: Memorize the glyph.$BTake it within yourself.$B$BDraw it on the ground before the flamegate.$BEast of here.$BEnter the Firelands.$B$BI cannot come with you.$BBut my children await. Inside.$B$BFind Garunda Mountainpeak within the realm of flame.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel through the flamegate in the Scorched Plain and locate Garunda Mountainpeak within.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Travel through the flamegate in the Scorched Plain and locate Garunda Mountainpeak within.
QuestData.RewardText: You were sent by the turtle god? Bless his almighty shell! I thought I was trapped down here forever.
